Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (O'Hare Branch)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Exp buses temp. rerouted SB: State, Roosevelt & Orange Line; NB: Michigan, 9th & State near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, 9th and State .

Southbound buses will operate via State, Roosevelt and the Orange Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Pk Exp buses temp. rerouted via Michigan, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55 South, DuSable LSD near Roosevelt/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55 South, DuSable Lake Shore Drive near Roosevelt/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 14th and Indiana due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 14th and Indiana due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
